title: Waldorf77
author: Waldorf77
created_time: November 28, 2023, 09:47:46 AMLast edit: November 28, 2023, 10:03:29 AM by Waldorf77
content: Im looking for partners and customers around the world.The new crypto escrowYou need buyer you need to exchange your crypto into fiat currency or something else Im sure we find solution together.For example you want confidential exchange nowdays you can't find it our service will be only solution for this and we don't just operating online but we can travel all around the world aswell.What we have discovered is that many of us could be a lot more successful and wealthy If they would find the right connections for their skills or knowledge or services they are looking for from others or services they will provide to others.For example china goverment don't allow people to exchange crypto it's very stricted so we will find the way if it's nessesary someone can go to china take the cash deal will be done.By the time we have a lot connections becouse we will connect the person who need something with other person who need it.Maybe you need to cash out crypto private ways that's not a problem we can find the right way.We will be like a wall street since wall street brokering the legacy Market equities and fiat currency we will be brokering the crypto and anything else what you can't find from nowhere else.One thing is to find right service or product or partner the another thing is privacy and taxes so we will use offshore ways aswell in terms of transactions in money cash crypto or any other form of wealth and assets.For example: you need to sell something for crypto and you want fair price we know that for every buyer there is seller and for every seller there is buyers.We would act like secret broker to secure the deals we don't have no political views or discrimonation against our clients partners we do deals with everybody.Nowdays when goverments all around the world placing the restrictions it's very difficult to do anything we need to solve this problem.What else we have discovered is that there is many creative people who's looking to sell their artwork for cryptocurrency but it's difficult to meet with the potential buyers and trust is another issue.We looking to make connections come to us tell what you need and we will find that what you looking for the right person and we will verify and will collect all the evidence to make sure everything will be good for both parties in deal.All the fees will be disscussed invidually but our aim is to provide quality service for low price.The main problem we all have is that the goverments all around the world placing restrictions and rules we gona have ways around it.Escrow are very confidential and your privacy will be highly protected.Im happy to assist you and happy to find best solution for you not matter what request you will have we can find any partner or buyers ,seller or specific service provider upon your request. One of the key aspects of our service depends the situation we will send one of our chief commander to the physical location to make photos and to be sure collect the evidences so the escrow team can investigate and give best price estimation with best execution of actionWe also looking for people to apply to work with us who's open minded and willing to do tasks traveling around the world and meeting with our partners and customers.We belive that If most of people problems are becaouse they can't find the right people or right connections and even when they find the trust is big issue.We don't ask your names or personal info only limited info If some bank transactions will be occured most of the times we will be treat all cases with special number so no names involved. Our team members will be signed under contract If they speak about it or reveal any of the confidential information they will be Held responseble lawfully by their actions.Off course they will be signed as something else to be held responsible for their actions by contract in the contract will be not mentioned anything about crypto escrow but they will be something sign the contract for something else and it will be legal off course.We will be operating around the world meeting with people making connections and brokering them with everything.So come to us and tell us what you need and let's start working together !!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: We, We, We... But who you are?You imagined it well, to be a middleman in some trades, but you didn't introduce yourself. Neither you nor your team. You forgot to add that today we have a large number of fraudsters and it is necessary to trust only verified and proven people. Even then, there are no guarantees, and you, as a completely anonymous, do not see that you can offer this type of service.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Writing such a lengthy article would not get you what you want here but what are your track records, do you have the reputation established already to handle such here. As you may wish to know platform members can not jeopardise their hard earned resources to a newbie account with no much activities and engagements here, nobody or a well established and reputable member to vouch for your services here.  I think you should get back to your table and do your planning properly. If you talk about escrow services, there are many here with lots of track records to their identity and are successful with good reviews.So therefore, I would join examplens to ask you same question. Who are you?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Without a website, sign a message saying you have X amount of Bitcoin or go first, otherwise no one will believe you. If you want to start a trading service on the forum, you will need to move the topic to currency exchange board and then send money for escrow, or at least go first to trusted members. However, if you have any things that prove that you are reliable, it is better to submit them.

comments.author: Waldorf77
comments.created_time: November 28, 2023, 10:18:57 AMLast edit: December 02, 2023, 10:20:12 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on November 28, 2023, 09:55:04 AMWe, We, We... But who you are?You imagined it well, to be a middleman in some trades, but you didn't introduce yourself. As you may wish to know platform members can not jeopardise their hard earned resources to a newbie account with no much activities and engagements here, nobody or a well established and reputable member to vouch for your services here.  I think you should get back to your table and do your planning properly. If you talk about escrow services, there are many here with lots of track records to their identity and are successful with good reviews.So therefore, I would join examplens to ask you same question. Who are you?Can they meet up physically If it's neccesary for better deal. ? I don't think they will do that so my service will be different and special and fully dedicated to partners and customers with their needs off course we don't provide services like buying fast food to you or some other silly request it's not a fun service its a serious service

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 28, 2023, 09:47:46 AMin the contract will be not mentioned anything about crypto escrow but they will be something sign the contract for something else and it will be legal off course.I'm not sure if I'm missing something, but if the so-called contract doesn't state any crypto-related deal, then how can it protect the affected party in a legal way?Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 28, 2023, 10:18:57 AMwe collect all the requests and start making database so we will put together the "demand and supply" And how are you planning to protect that database [an in-depth explanation would be nice]?Quote from: SFR10 on October 07, 2023, 01:31:56 PMBTW, multi-posting is against forum rules [you can respond to multiple users by clicking the "insert quote" button at the top right corner of each post (when you're in the "post reply" field)].

comments.author: Waldorf77

In database no names no other info then just the request and description of need or service of the partner clients.Only number or Code we all have just the Code you need to know your Code your name will be number.Well it's pretty much like the secret service operating no names only the number or Code.And very similar system with how the goverment have nuclear codes system sometimes it doesn't need to think everything ourselfes we see what works allready and we might just copy paste someone else actions. We just look how the secret services and spy groups operating "copy paste" and we do it good they use those methods for power and influence and for money but we will use for privacy and helping out the people in need.

Who are you?Can they meet up physically If it's neccesary for better deal. ? I don't think they will do that so my service will be different and special and fully dedicated to partners and customers with their needs off course we don't provide services like buying fast food to you or some other silly request it's not a fun service its a serious service Off course you know this is not a fast food business neither is this platform a restaurant where you could just enter and demand for whatever you want just like that. There are laid down procedures long in existence that must be followed and courtesy demands that you do the needful if you must be in tandem with the community. And lastly, I heard you mention serious service and not fun service and I am happy you mentioned that because the last time I checked your announcement thread it looks like one not serious about their service they render but  rather a poor coordinated introduction with no identity to reckon with. So now who is making a silly request here?

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 28, 2023, 09:47:46 AMWe will be operating around the world meeting with people making connections and brokering them with everything.Unless you show us something that will make us believe that you are capable and knowledgeable we have doubts that you can, these are just words I'm looking for a website, platform, social media account, or anything that will prove that you are legit and you are capable, all I know is this is just another attempt to gain trust and eventually laid out a plan to scam, because legit people are proud to present themselvesQuoteSo come to us and tell us what you need and let's start working together !!No one will come because you're not showing that you're legit and you are capable, if you want people to take you seriously then show seriousness in your offer.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on November 28, 2023, 03:19:39 PMQuoteSo come to us and tell us what you need and let's start working together !!No one will come because you're not showing that you're legit and you are capable, if you want people to take you seriously then show seriousness in your offer.I re-read the entire topic and it does not seem to me that there is anything serious enough in this offer, nor that there are any guarantees of the seriousness of the business, especially since the most important details that are supposed to make up the offer are completely missing. There is no information about the stages of completion of operations, the fees charged, or even the size of the business to be managed.Even with the availability of information regarding the identity of the work team, and even after verifying its credibility, this remains insufficient to fully trust the business because their qualifications to manage this business must be proven by learning about their experience in the field and the reputation that they have.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 28, 2023, 10:18:57 AMWorld is small and info not so safe even here the Admin has the info of all the users.Belive me If too many people start losing and people who use this kind of services has some money then i assume they got some power and contacts they can find you.Don't forget many things people been frauding online for example cloud mining and they been visited in their homes and not a nice way and they been making "free will agreement" to pay back and more the money they took it.World is small and everybody knows everybody and every person background and contacts are quite visible.This is complete nonsense, nobody will travel from Brazil to Pakistan because of a $1000 scam. You talk about online business and mention guarantees that someone comes to someone's house to collect money.In the end, I didn't ask you where I could find you, but to introduce yourself and explain why someone should trust you. Answer the question directly, I guess you don't expect us to just trust someone about whom all we know is the nickname Waldorf77. What should I tell my wife when asks me, where are our life savings? With Waldorf77 from Bitcointalk, he wrote a wall of text, he must be a good person.
